NO_CLIENT_ERROR: Client is not connected to Kafka.
NO_TOPIC_ERROR: Impossible to produce/consume on a non existing topic.
MESSAGE_NOT_OBJECT: Message provided in produceOnTopic() is not of type: Object or String.
MESSAGES_NOT_ARRAY: Messages provided in produceManyOnTopic() is not of type: Array of Objects.
CONSUMER_ID_NOT_STRING: Consumer's ID must be of type: String.
